document.full_text: fears of radiation from japan have driven some customers at health food stores on the west coast to stock up on kelp out of a belief its iodine content can protect against thyroid cancer, health food retailers said on friday.
document.title: radiation fears drive sales of kelp on west coast
lines_and_colors: fears of radiation from japan have driven some customers at health food stores on the west coast to stock up on kelp out of a belief its iodine content can protect against thyroid cancer, health food retailers said on friday.
